description: send email about Livebook market data refresh for North America

processingCommand.script:
#!/bin/ksh
echo "getting the reporting date"
echo "content of the file:"
cat ${HOME}/integration/ReportingDate/Common/Reporting_Date.txt
REPORTING_DATE=`cat ${HOME}/integration/ReportingDate/Common/Reporting_Date.txt`
echo "displaying the reporting date"
echo "$REPORTING_DATE"
echo "sending the email to nytrading@rabobank.com,fm.global.MurexITSupport@rabobank.com"
echo "Market Data is refreshed for livebook flash PL North America on $MX_ENVIRONMENT. This is the offical EOD Market Data."| mailx -s "$MX_ENVIRONMENT: Market Data refreshed per $REPORTING_DATE for Flashbook pnl North America" nytrading@rabobank.com,fm.global.MurexITSupport@rabobank.com
